name: Eau de Parfum Perfume Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Discover your favorite scents with this mini eau de parfum set, perfect for trying or travel. Effortlessly switch fragrances to match your mood. All products are clean and nontoxic..This Set Contains:- 7 x 0.05 oz/ 1.5 mL eau de parfums in No.02 Le Long Fond, No.04 Bois de Balincourt, No.09 Vallee de Farney, No.12 Bousval, No.13 Nouvelle Vague, No.14 Icila, Antidris Cassis.Clean & Planet Aware
ingredients: Andritis Cassis:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Citral...No.02 Le Long Fond:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Citronellol, Geraniol, Eugenol, Linalool...No.04 Bois de Balincourt:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Limonene...No.12 Bousval:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Limonene, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Citronellol, Citral, Geraniol...No.13 Nouvelle Vague:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene...No.14 Icila:.Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Geraniol, Coumarin, Benzyl Alcohol...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-All fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body: Apply one to two sprays at the pulse points of your body (wrists, neck), or in the creases of your knees and elbows for a stronger, more enduring scent. .-Reapply as needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this set. I liked every scent and will continue to play with them. Can't say I liked one enough to buy a bigger bottle but I was really pleased with these scents and like having testers of them all.
